attributes.action: UK Government to allow fuel duty tax cut
attributes.additional_details: Implement tax cuts on UK fuel.
attributes.background: Request that Rishi Sunak implements a tax reduction on UK fuels whilst the Russian invasion of Ukraine is ongoing. UK motorists can not afford to travel and it is causing a huge impact on the economy, businesses and the lives of millions of tax paying motorists within the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for very similar actions:

'Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

'Stop charging VAT on fuel duty': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599411

'Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585

'Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567
